<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scintillating Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=5048) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 204 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 157 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Wellspring Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=104) (Level 16)

</column>

---

Your spells become a radiant display of light and color. If your next action is to Cast a Spell that doesn’t have the darkness trait, has no duration, and requires creatures to attempt a Reflex save, the spell explodes in a spray of scintillating lights, in addition to its other effects. Each creature that failed its Reflex save against the spell is dazzled for 1 round, and those who critically failed are instead blinded for 1 round.
name: Scintillating Spell
